title: NextJs 14.2 version
description: The Next.js 15 Release Candidate (RC) is now available. This early version allows you to test the latest features before the upcoming stable release. React: Support for the React 19 RC, React Compiler (Experimental), and hydration error improvements Caching: fetch requests, GET Route Handlers, and client navigations are no longer cached by default Partial Prerendering (Experimental): New Layout and Page config option for incremental adoption next/after (Experimental): New API to execute code after a response has finished streaming create-next-app: Updated design and a new flag to enable Turbopack in local development Bundling external packages (Stable): New config options for App and Pages Router
